OrgName.entry: LEONARD CHESHIRE SHEFFIELD CARE AT HOME SERVICE

Desc.entry:
A registered charity which provides personal and domiciliary care services for the elderly or anyone with a disability or a support need wishing to remain in their own home. Care provision from 20 minutes to 24 hour live-in service. Respite and holiday relief can also be arranged. Emergency 24 hour on call system. All care packages are tailored to the individual offering choice and opportunity. Care plans are agreed with each client.
Supports private clients as well as clients in receipt of direct payments. Referrals via Neighbourhood and Community Care Directorate or self referral if funded by Direct Payment, Independent Living Fund or the Health Authority. Provides advice and information on Direct Payments.
The service is a member of the UK Home Care Association and operates under their code of practice. Prices start at £7.87 per 30 mins during daytime and £9.45 for 30 mins at night time. Bank holidays and sleep-ins incur extra costs. Please contact for up to date prices. Registered with Neighbourhood and Community Care Directorate.
